Name: Suzie Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Pisco, pineapple and Sauvignon Blanc wine are a match made in heaven, while gentian liqueur provides complex underlying gentian bittersweet notes.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Suzie Cocktail contains 152 calories
